title: "JavaScript heap out of memory" when trying to verify a contract
body:
After running this command
`npx hardhat verify --network kovan 0xbe84244b25f7b3F959C037A7d1a7cfda7cc13D1A`

I'm getting an error "Javascript heap out of memory"

Error is occurring on Defisaver repo https://github.com/DecenterApps/defisaver-contracts/
Hey @nklipa13, we just published `@nomiclabs/hardhat-etherscan@2.0.1` that fixes this issue. Please re-open if it happens again!
